titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the approval of the proposed Agreement for Cooperation Between the American Institute in Taiwan and the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representatives Office in the United States Concerning Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy.

A joint resolution relating to the approval of the proposed Agreement for Cooperation Between the American Institute in Taiwan and the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representatives Office in the United States Concerning Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: Favors the proposed agreement for peaceful nuclear energy cooperation between the American Institute in Taiwan and the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representative Office in the United States transmitted to Congress by the President on January 7, 2014.
